content.html: Brain just gave me a massive meta sign I have ADHD: I had an anxious meltdown about some basic tasks. So rather than doing the basic tasks I write down ways of helping myself in the future to do the basic task with less anxiety. Then I tweet about it rather than doing the task.
content.value:
Brain just gave me a massive meta sign I have ADHD:

I had an anxious meltdown about some basic tasks. So rather than doing the basic tasks I write down ways of helping myself in the future to do the basic task with less anxiety.

Then I tweet about it rather than doing the task.
